channel.title: Mapping on FalconBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Mapping on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 6
item.description:
ðŸ§  June 6, 2025 â€“ Friday

  • Generated 2D Map Successfully: Continued progress on the mapping front. Achieved a consistent and accurate 2D map with improved detail.
  • Debugged Localization Issues: Faced challenges with robot localization but began troubleshooting systematically. Gained insights into possible TF and odometry conflicts.
  • Explored vSLAM Packages: Dedicated time to learning about visual SLAM systems. Compared different approaches and shortlisted ones that fit our setup.

item.title: Day 5
item.description:
ðŸŽ® June 5, 2025 â€“ Thursday

  • Gaming with FS, ZDC, and HD24 Reunion: Reunited virtually with close friends for a fun gaming session. It was a nostalgic break and a great way to unwind.
  • Successful Map Generation and Optimization: Achieved a working 2D map after several iterations and calibrations. Optimized performance for better clarity and stability. Huge milestone!

item.title: Day 4
item.description:
ðŸ§  June 4, 2025 â€“ Wednesday

  • Had Technical Interview for Project: Faced the much-anticipated technical round today. Answered questions on project scope, tech stack, and individual contributions. Felt confident about my responses.
  • Mapping Test in Progress: Continued testing mapping workflows using simulation tools. Progressed with identifying errors and calibrating parameters for accurate outputs.
